item.title: Android Apps – 2021
item.description: Now that we’re at home a lot, it’s time to clean up my phone. Over time I’ve fallen into some bad habits, and it’s time to clean up my act. Category Currently using Better alternative Ad Blocker blokada.org - App Store Google App store F-Droid Audio / Video conferencing Zoom - Contacts and AddressBook sync Google addressbook DAVx⁵ - F-Droid Ebooks Moon+ Reader for Android ?
